lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did the people ask Aaron to make?
answers: A god to lead them
A tent to worship in
A new set of stone tablets
A giant golden sandwich

questions.text: What did Aaron make, and how did he make it?
answers: A golden calf made from melted gold earrings
A bronze snake made from spare tools
A stone calf carved from from the mountain
A gigantic fire built from wood
They celebrated wildly in front of it
They quietly prayed and went home
They rode the calf back to Egypt
They sat on top of the golden calf
I will destroy the people and start a new nation with you
The people are having a good time
You may stay on the mountain forever
I will stop sending manna

questions.text: What did Moses remind God about?
answers: The promises made to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob
How long the journey had been
The size of the golden calf
How tired Moses felt

questions.text: What did Moses do with the two stone tablets of Godâ€™s law?
answers: He smashed them on the ground
He laid them before the golden calf
He gave them to Aaron
He dropped them by accident

questions.text: What did Moses do with the golden calf?
answers: Burned it, ground it into powder, and made the people drink it
Covered it with a cloth
Melted it and saved the gold
Carried it up the mountain

questions.text: What lie did Aaron tell Moses?
answers: I threw the gold into the fire and out popped this golden calf
The people made it without me
God told me to make it
God made this golden calf for us

questions.text: What did Moses ask God to do?
answers: Forgive the people or punish him in their place
Ignore what happened
Destroy the golden calf
Give the people more gold

questions.text: What did God send to punish the people for their sin?
answers: A plague
A flood
A swarm of frogs
An earthquake
